channel.title: Forum Member of the Week - 04: Southborne
channel.description:
Featured Auxy Artist #04: @Southborne = ![32 PM|690x173](upload://khIYHenlZP4cM8yR9Vhv6sisa9w.jpg)
<big>S</big>outhBorne is an Australian-based producer, who won Auxy Forum Awards for both Music Production and for supporting others in the forum last year. He hosted [Auxy Beat The Clock](https://disco.auxy.co/t/beat-the-clock-14/1595) with a harmoic minor challenge & specializes in "heavy beats and really chilled tracks". He gigs, plays guitar and appreciates a good ginger beer.
**Week starting: 22 Jan, 2018.** - Please listen to at least one of their tracks (or more) - Provide at least one Soundcloud comment / feedback about their music during their week. - Comment in this thread once you've provided any feedback.
Check out their tracks in [Soundcloud](https://soundcloud.com/southborne/tracks).
If you want to be in the weekly draw [add your name here.](https://disco.auxy.co/t/forum-member-of-the-week-who-wants-to-be-involved/5518)
![4720_1|120x120](upload://dG61p2EtCtpsAmlzC78lOnGgS9f.jpg)![4720_1|120x120](upload://dG61p2EtCtpsAmlzC78lOnGgS9f.jpg)![4720_1|120x120](upload://dG61p2EtCtpsAmlzC78lOnGgS9f.jpg)![4720_1|120x120](upload://dG61p2EtCtpsAmlzC78lOnGgS9f.jpg)

item.title: Forum Member of the Week - 04: Southborne
item.dc:creator: Southborne
item.description:
Thanks to everyone for your feedback and support. Really appreciated hearing what everyone had to say! Can’t wait for the next dude to get picked so I can join in on the fun again!

Read full topic

item.title: Forum Member of the Week - 04: Southborne
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
Ok so I’m currently on The Alley (I listen backwards, sue me) and I’ve already loving all of this! I’m not sure which of these tracks were made using Auxy modern or Auxy original. I would love to try and remix Electric Vibe if that’s an auxy modern track and you still have it at @Southborne I couldn’t get enough of that song!

Read full topic

item.title: Forum Member of the Week - 04: Southborne
item.dc:creator: anon73773654
item.description:
@Southborne Not much to say here honestly. I’ve listened to so many of your dank tracks. Guess I’ll give feedback on some new ones.

South Shuffle: Lovin’ the piano, idk about the ducker. Love the synth! The build up is awesome, and I’m shuffling to the chorus!

Okay, it’s impossible. You’ve got nothing to improve on. xD

Really like the chill feel to Late Hours btw!

Read full topic
item.source: Forum Member of the Week - 04: Southborne

item.title: Forum Member of the Week - 04: Southborne
item.dc:creator: SpaghettiSauce
item.description:
Your songs are all super groovy. I listened to your new release South Shuffle, and it’s really good. The new drums really helped.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: MisterMaster
item.description:
If you haven’t left any feedback, re-posts or likes for @Southborne, then you may want to do it soon, before his week ends.

Read full topic
item.source: Forum Member of the Week - 04: Southborne

item.title: Forum Member of the Week - 04: Southborne
item.dc:creator: Stigmo
item.description:
@Southborne I enjoyed listening to your tunes so much. You are definitely one of my favorite auxy producers and your style is right up my alley. I still remember being new to the auxy forum, and then I stumbled upon Panther, which convinced me that making hard house in auxy is possible, so thank you for that! I love your bigroom tracks, they’re lit I also really like how you try to mix things up with more chill tracks, and they are awesome as well. My favorite tracks are definitely Leopard, Panther and Careful Whisper. Please don’t ever stop

Read full topic

item.title: Forum Member of the Week - 04: Southborne
item.dc:creator: anon35891271
item.description:
@ Myboisouth Dude, you are such an inspiration to me. I still remmeber when “In The Night” dropped for the first time. That was your “Hip Drop” days. Nostalgia at its finest. On top of that, you are my second to top in likes! Thats crazy!! Especially coming from you!! Thanks so much for the support and amazing music. Much love from everyone
